channel.title: Comments on: Review: “Shades of Milk and Honey” by Mary Robinette Kowal
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Danielle Perry
item.dc:creator: Danielle Perry
item.description: I just read this recently! It was enjoyable but paled in comparison to Susanna Clarke's Jonathan Strange and Mr Norrell. But then again I've never been much of an Austen fan. ;)
